scripts.postbuild: echo 'Preparing functions/standalone for deployment...' && rm -rf functions/standalone && mkdir -p functions/standalone && echo 'Copying Next.js standalone output...' && cp -a .next/standalone/. functions/standalone/ && echo 'Copying public assets...' && ([ -d public ] && cp -a public/. functions/standalone/public/ || echo 'No public directory to copy.') && echo 'Copying credentials...' && ([ -f firebase-admin-creds.json ] && cp firebase-admin-creds.json functions/standalone/ || echo 'No credentials file.') && echo 'Preparation complete.'
scripts.build:prod: env-cmd -f .env.production npm run build && npm run postbuild
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && cd functions && npm run build && cd .. && firebase deploy --only functions:nextServer,hosting
